title: 284. Andy & DJ CTI: Activists At Starbucks, Biden's “Ministry Of Truth” & Poll: Biden To Blame For High Gas Prices
itunes:title: 284. Andy & DJ CTI: Activists At Starbucks, Biden's “Ministry Of Truth” & Poll: Biden To Blame For High Gas Prices
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss two activists at a Seattle Starbucks who glued their hands to the counter in protest of the non-dairy milk supercharge, the Biden administration announcing that it's assembling a, "Disinformation Governance Board" to combat disinformation in the 2022 midterms, and the Rasmussen poll that showed 51% of Americans believe Biden is to blame for the higher gas prices.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss two activists at a Seattle Starbucks who glued their hands to the counter in protest of the non-dairy milk supercharge, the Biden administration announcing that it's assembling a, "Disinformation Governance Board" to combat disinformation in the 2022 midterms, and the Rasmussen poll that showed 51% of Americans believe Biden is to blame for the higher gas prices.
